content.medevac_hover:
In this mission you will have to fly an HEMS mission to a location on your GPS to assist with a winch-extraction of an injured person followed by safe transfer to designated hospital.
Details on the accident location and accident type will be provided at mission start. Usage of a helicopter is mandatory.
Hints for winch extraction: - Hover within 20m radius and below 150ft over target - Crew will perform all required tasks autonomously when within target range. - Observe status messages during all operations and follow instructions. - Maintain a stable hover to prevent inducing dangerous oscillations while the winch is extended. - Once patient and crew recovery is complete you will be instructed to proceed to the next waypoint.
Hints for patient dropoff: - Land on the helipad designated via GPS. - Shut down engines - Observe status messages and follow instructions. - Wait for signal to take off. - Start engines and proceed to next GPS waypoint.

mission_info.short_desc:
Hello Pilot,
In this mission you will be assigned a MEDEVAC task that may consist of an emergency extraction from an accident scene or hospital - either by winch or by landing.
Homebase: LSMD, Rega 1 helipad (lat:47.39612 lon:8.63762) Aircraft: Airbus H145
Please make sure your aircraft is parked and ready before starting the mission.
Each mission ends successfully with you returning safely to your homebase.
Further instructions will be provided after the mission is generated.
Good luck!

leg.name: leg_1_target
leg.desc: Primary mission: Search and Rescue. Location: {navaid_loc_desc}. Coordinates: {navaid_lat}, {navaid_lon}. Landing at destination not possible. Route has been uploaded to your FMS. Good flight.
leg.dynamic_message: Establish visual on target area and reduce speed.
Crew standby for hover. Wind check.

leg.name: leg_2_dropoff
leg.dynamic_message: Look out for helipad and prepare for landing.

leg.name: leg_3_rtb
leg.dynamic_message: Look out for helipad and prepare for landing.

leg.name: leg_1_target
leg.desc: Primary mission: Patient extraction. Location: {navaid_loc_desc}. Coordinates: {navaid_lat}, {navaid_lon}. Route has been uploaded to your FMS. Good flight.
leg.dynamic_message: Look out for target and prepare for landing.

leg.name: leg_2_dropoff
leg.dynamic_message: Look out for helipad and prepare for landing.

leg.name: leg_3_rtb
leg.dynamic_message: Look out for helipad and prepare for landing.

leg.name: leg_1_target
leg.desc: Primary mission: Patient transfer. Location: {navaid_loc_desc}. Coordinates: {navaid_lat}, {navaid_lon}. Route has been uploaded to your FMS. Good flight.
leg.dynamic_message: Look out for helipad and prepare for landing.

leg.name: leg_2_dropoff
leg.dynamic_message: Look out for helipad and prepare for landing.

leg.name: leg_3_rtb
leg.dynamic_message: Look out for helipad and prepare for landing.

message.name: msg_1_open_door
message.mix: Cabin door opened - standby for deploying crew.

message.name: msg_1_deploy_crew
message.mix: Crew deployed - standby to lower winch.

message.name: msg_1_start_winch_down
message.mix: Lowering winch - hold position and stay below 150 feet above ground.

message.name: msg_1_hold_position
message.mix: Hold position!

message.name: msg_1_leaving_position
message.mix: Get back into position!

message.name: msg_1_stop_winch
message.mix: Winch extended - standby for patient pickup. Hold position.

message.name: msg_1_pickup_patient
message.mix: Patient secured - standby for winch retrieval.

message.name: msg_1_winch_up
message.mix: Start raising winch carefully - standby for recovering patient.

message.name: msg_1_onboard_patient
message.mix: Patient recovered - standby for recovering crew.

message.name: msg_1_onboard_crew
message.mix: All aboard - standby for closing door.

message.name: msg_1_close_door
message.mix: Door closed.

message.name: msg_1_doors_open
message.mix: Doors open - standby for crew unboarding.

message.name: msg_1_crew_off
message.mix: Crew unboarded - standby for boarding patient.

message.name: msg_1_patient_on
message.mix: Patient on board - standby for crew boarding.

message.name: msg_1_crew_on
message.mix: Crew on board - standby for closing doors.

message.name: msg_1_doors_closed
message.mix: Doors closed - ready for takeoff.

message.name: msg_2_doors_open
message.mix: Doors open - standby for crew unboarding.

message.name: msg_2_crew_off
message.mix: Crew unboarded - standby for unloading patient.

message.name: msg_2_patient_off
message.mix: Patient unloaded - standby for crew boarding.

message.name: msg_2_crew_on
message.mix: Crew on board - standby for closing doors.

message.name: msg_2_doors_closed
message.mix: Doors closed - ready for takeoff.

point.loc_desc: Chämmetenweg, 8600 Dübendorf, Switzerland, Hover Training Area

message.name: 5nm_alert
message.mix: 5 nautical miles to destination.

message.name: 2nm_alert
message.mix: 2 nautical miles to destination.

end_mission.success_msg: Well done pilot! See you next time!
